question:
[Alice]'s mother, [Judy], was busy planning a holiday party with her brother, [William], that she forgot an appointment, [Freddie] and his sister [Alice] went out for ice cream. [Beverly] went to the baseball game with her uncle [Kenneth]. [Janice] told a secret to her sister, [Michele]. [Michele] passed it along to her brother, [Larry]. [Kenneth]'s brother [Larry] would not let him play the xbox game. [Oscar] took his favorite son [William] to a baseball game where he caught a foul ball as a souvenir. [Beverly] and her brother [Oscar] enlisted in the army
Question: How is [Janice] related to [Freddie]?
